name: Raekor's Burden
flavorText: These spaulders are the symbol of the Oxen Tribe Warmaster. Raekor stripped them from her fallen commander and donned them herself in order to lead her tribe to victory at the sack of Samauren.
flavorTextHtml: These spaulders are the symbol of the Oxen Tribe Warmaster. Raekor stripped them from her fallen commander and donned them herself in order to lead her tribe to victory at the sack of Samauren.

primary.textHtml: +[91 - 100] Resistance to All Elements

setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Furious Charge refunds a charge if it hits only 1 enemy.(4) Set:     
 Furious Charge gains the effect of every rune and deals 1000% increased damage.(6) Set:     
 Every use of Furious Charge increases the damage of your next Fury-spending attack by 5500%. This effect stacks. Every use of a Fury-spending attack consumes up to 5 stacks.
setDescriptionHtml:
(2) Set:
Furious Charge refunds a charge if it hits only 1 enemy.
(4) Set:
Furious Charge gains the effect of every rune and deals 1000% increased damage.
(6) Set:
Every use of Furious Charge increases the damage of your next Fury-spending attack by 5500%. This effect stacks. Every use of a Fury-spending attack consumes up to 5 stacks.
